# endpoint

**Instance Property**

Returns an endpoint object that may be sent over an existing connection.

## Declaration

```swift
var endpoint: NSXPCListenerEndpoint { get }
```

## Discussion

The receiver of the endpoint can use this object to create a new connection to this [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener] object. The resulting `NSXPCListenerEndpoint` object uniquely names this listener object across connections.

## Related Documentation

- **Daemons and Services Programming Guide**
